channel.title: Lithuania Pk! Need development team!
channel.description:
[ul][list][list]Hello people. Today i gonna show you how i edited hybrid pvp v3 client and source. I fixed few of bosses which was glitched, added a shop which looks like this in this link: http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=pkstore.jpg
A lot of minigames: -Barrow -Pest control. In pest control shop where is korasi, chaotic wepons and more. Bosses: -Tormented demosn -Corporal beast -And more :) I need a development team. If you want to join it fill in information about you :) Server Sided Coders [/list][/list][/ul]
Code: [Select] Name: Age: Why do you want this job: How much time will you be working: Will you follow the rules: Any Experience: How well can you code java: MSN (Optional): Skype (Optional):
Client Sided Coders Code: [Select] Client Coder Name: Age: Why do you want this job: How much time will you be Working: Will you follow the rules: Any Experience: Can you add Custom Buttons: Are you good with Interfaces? MSN (Optional): Skype (Optional):
Hoster Code: [Select] Name: Age: How Many hours can you Host: Have you hosted a server before: [/center] GFX Artist Code: [Select] Name: Age: Experience: Programs you use: show some work: [/center] Thank you :)

item.title: Lithuania Pk! Need development team!
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

[center]
Hello people. Today I’m going to show you how i edited the, Hybrid Pvp V3 release. I fixed a few of the bosses that were glitched, and added a shop.

[Click me to view the shop]

Minigames & Bosses

[code]- Barrow

  • Pest control. (In the pest control shop there is Korasi, Chaotics, and more.
  • Tormented demosn
  • Corporal beast
  • Etc[/code]

    I need a development team, If you’d like to join it fill in information below

Server Sided Coders

Name: Age: Why do you want this job: How much time will you be working: Will you follow the rules: Any Experience: How well can you code java: MSN (Optional): Skype (Optional):

[b]Client Sided Coders

Name: Age: Why do you want this job: How much time will you be Working: Will you follow the rules: Any Experience: Can you add Custom Buttons: Are you good with Interfaces? MSN (Optional): Skype (Optional):

Hoster

Name: Age: How Many hours can you Host: Have you hosted a server before:

GFX Artist

Name: Age: Experience: Programs you use: show some work:

Thank you [/center]

Read full topic
